elements.name: panel6
elements.title:
Write the following sentences with a genitive object in the same way as the example. 
Example: She did not cast her vote. > She abstained from voting.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: The report needs to be thoroughly revised.
elements.correctAnswer: The report requires a thorough revision.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: They were sure that they would win.
elements.correctAnswer: They were sure of their victory.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: He was accused of having committed murder.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title:
Write the following sentences with a genitive object in the same way as the example. 
Example: She did not cast her vote. > She abstained from voting.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Everyone knew about the dangers.
elements.correctAnswer: Everyone was aware of the dangers.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: We take care of the problem.
elements.correctAnswer: We take care of the problem.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: The many victims are remembered at the ceremony.
elements.correctAnswer: The many victims are commemorated at the ceremony.
